body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting ABC Car Dealership customer support. My name is Douglas Bell and I will be assisting you today. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Teresa Richardson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Teresa. To assist you better, could you please provide me with the vehicle identification number (VIN) of your car? It is usually a seventeen-digit number.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the VIN of my car is five zero one two three four...

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Teresa. Could you also provide me with the approximate mileage on your car? Please spell out the numbers for accuracy.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The mileage on my car is sixty-seven thousand two hundred.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Teresa. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help, Douglas.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Teresa. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
